price: 191. Bakosangisa ye na baye bakela eloko moko te nzoka nde bango moko bakelama?
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
